content: cute to the core these crochet dishcloths look great and work even harder you choose their purpose lily sugar n cream gives you fantastic colors to make this one a decorative addition to any kitchen craft a set in a selection of shades and share them with friends to bring on some smiles apple is worked in rounds leaf is worked in row add hanging loop and embroider seeds to finish materials lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m -main color mc ecru 00004 - 1 ball -contrast a country red 01530 or hot green 01712 - 1 ball -contrast b warm brown 01130 - 1 ball -contrast c sage green 00084 - 1 ball -size u s g/6 4 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge video tutorial 1 1 https //www yarnspirations com/video-y-crochet-an-apple-dishcloth html
